data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Lima Province, Peru that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lima Province, Peru
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Lima Province.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Lima Province who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Lima Province who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, let it be said of the 6,509,955 lost in Lima Province that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 1,095,746 believers in Lima Province that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lima Province, Peru has a population of 7,605,700.

We estimate Lima Province has 1,095,746 people who might know Jesus, 6,058,222 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 451,733 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Lima Province to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
